summary: Several retexes made into standalone saddles for use with Immersive Horses.
descriptionHtml:
[size=4][b]What this mod does:[/b]
[/size]
Compiles some of the fine retextures of horse saddles into craftable standalone pieces.

[size=4][b]How to Craft them:[/b][/size]

I have added a condition to craft the saddles. You'll need to have certain tokens for the crafting recipes to show up.
You can craft them at the smithy/anvil for a septim.

Vanilla:

Token of Hunor

Swift Steeds Stables:

Token of Mattias = Mustang / Bruman halfbreed
Token of Ahlam = Arab
Token of Ghamorz    = Gypsy Vanner
Token of Ferrum = Fjord Mountain Pony
Token oh Ilfhild = Ivarstead Atmoran Pony

These'll make sure your smithing menu is not cluttered all the time with about a hundred of saddles.

[size=4][b]Conflicts[/b]:[/size]

None I know of. Cleaned/Made with TES5Edit.

Since this mod was made along the lines of Craftable Horse Barding by sevencardz, though not a requirement, it is best used with IHO.


[size=4][b]Credits:

[size=2]Concept/framework[/size]:

[/b][size=2][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/64069/]Craftable Horse Barding[/url] - sevencardz

[b]Textures:[/b][/size][/size]

Bellyaches Fur and Quilted Saddles - [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/84873/]wrig675[/url]
[url=http://www.slofslair.co.uk/mods/93]Unique Frost[/url] - Slof
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/19710]Zira Skyrim Horse Base[/url] - [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/490678]Zira[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/9109/]Divine Aegis HD[/url] - [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/1613992]Sader[/url] and Shodan44
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13348/]Horse Armors for Skyrim[/url] - [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/294935/?]Mystikhybrid[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/3200/?]Ornate Saddles[/url] - [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/296845/?]sedryn[/url]


Also huge thanks for wrig675 for letting me use the quilted textures!
Thanks to sedryn for the permission to use the ornate textures!

[b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49727]Swift Steeds Stables[/url] version is possible thanks to [/b][b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/3253645]Fierymarigold[/url][/b]


[size=4][b]Disclaimer:[/b][/size]

I've made exactly 0 of these textures.
author: Seirun

files.name: Standalone Saddles Vanilla
files.changelogHtml:
New: Vanilla Saddles
-Added Zira's Saddles Crafting recipes (did not notice they were missing)
-Linked all vanilla recipes to a condition to declutter smithing menu: Token of Hunor (craftable at the forge for 1 septim)

Changes:
-Renamed 'Zira Gold/Silver' to 'Zira Gold/Silver Studded'
-Renamed 'Zira Gilded' to 'Zira Gold Hemmed'
-Renamed 'Zira Light' to 'Zira Cream'

Fixes:
-Corrected the weight of Quilted Pale Green Saddle from 25 to 0

New: Swift Steeds Saddles
- The same colours for each of the five types of used saddles (19x5 = 95)
- Crafting of each of the five saddle type is linked to its own token condition to declutter smithy (19x5 = 95)
- Tokens are not used up, just "counted" and can be stored, thrown or traded away (value = 1 septim) if not in use

Tokens:

Token of Mattias = Mustang
Token of Ahlam = Arab
Token of Grougaloragran = Gypsy (or one of those funny orc names)
Token of Forgot its Name = Fjord Mountain Pony
Token oh I.. I-i.. Ilfhild? = Ivarstead Atmoran Pony

# Warning:
# NO tempering available for Swift Saddles at the moment
# NO amount of memory training will make me remember the token names I've picked on a whim (as unprofessional as it may be)

files.name: Standalone Saddles Vanilla
files.changelogHtml:
Vanilla / Swift:

Added ornate and belly's fur saddles for all horses.
Also made a boo-boo that I could not correct, because I'm actually a novice at modding:
All previously made saddles Will disappear from inventories, both yours and the horses's... Sorry.
